author: Gary B
comment: Just as good as the site.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hey Gary,

We had a fix done for the app that should have resolved this issue. Could you please restart the app and let us know if you can search now? If you're still having issues, then please let us know at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com and we will look into it further.

Thanks!

author: Kevin Applegate
comment: (Update:  New version fixed the nagging message, and Deal Zone is back.  Kudos to the B&H dev team for a fast fix.) It started asking me to rate it every time I open it, and each time I go back to the app's home page, EVEN THOUGH I HAVE ALREADY RATED IT, which started at 5 stars, but is now 2.  App has been great, otherwise, and B&H is excellent.

author: Sam Goller
comment: The recent update eliminated the annoying "Rate Me" pop up and Deal Zone is back!! This app is 5 stars.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Sam,

We have fixed these two issues with our latest app update. Please do check it out and if you have any further questions then definitely reach out to us at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Galen Myers
comment: I've ordered around 30 things now over the past 2 years, and have loved it. Yes sometimes orders are late but they're good at making up for the mistake. Definently a 5 star service!

author: Bryan Sumruld
comment: Really enjoy the app. I like the daily deals and easy access to items I am interested in. Loading has a fe glitches sometimes but with the new update it's getting better.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Bryan,

We have fixed these issues with the latest app update. We apologize for the inconvenience. If you have any further questions or comments, then please do let us know at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Mark D60
comment: The app used to be great, but with the update, it doesn't work at all. Search seems to do nothing.  I can't get to any merchandise at all.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Mark,

We apologize for the inconvenience. We're aware about this issue which seems to be affecting our users on Android Lollipop and below. We are working towards addressing it as soon as we can. If you have any further questions then please do not hesitate to reach out to androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Raziel1030
comment: Although I still love B&H, the app refuses to work, even with the latest update. I open it, and it gets stuck trying to open the main page, and then it either stays there or crashes :(

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Raziel1030,

We apologize for the inconvenience. We're aware about this issue which seems to be affecting our users on Android Lollipop and below. We are working towards addressing it as soon as we can. If you have any further questions then please do not hesitate to reach out to androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Robert Poulsen
comment: B&H always does it good. Great prices and never any problems. I always shop around but I seem to end up here.

author: Nachiketh Reddy
comment: Now a while ago i said the app is crashing. I uninstalled it and re installed it. Now its working fine. Please add this comparison feature

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hey Nachiketh,

Sorry to hear that the app is crashing for you. We want to figure out why this is happening and address it ASAP. Please reach out to androidappsupport@bhphoto.com and we can take it from there. Looking forward to hearing from you.

author: Phong Nguyen
comment: It was all good until they removed the daily deals. Other than that, ordering and trackings are very easy and simple.  Updated: I changed my vote to 5 stars since you responded so quickly and the feature is back.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Phong,

Sorry about the inconvenience. We released an update today that has fixed this issue!
If you have any further issues or suggestions then please do let us know at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

Thank you!

author: Don Rambarran
comment: Very good app all around. Sometimes the prices can be confusing though

author: Jericho B
comment: B&H Store is 5 star... but android app needs more polishing. App always asking to "tell us how we're doing" even after review was written. Also, no option for "no thanks" for those that don't want to leave a review.  Update: App issue resolved(promptly)...B&H really cares about their customers. They are truly a 5-star establishment.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Jericho,

Sorry about that! We have addressed the issue with the 'rate me' pop up always showing up with our latest app update. 

Thank you for your suggestion about adding a 'No Thanks' option! We will see what we can do there.

If you have any further questions/comments then please feel free to reach out to us at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Stefan Sorne
comment: *Edit: thanks! Reinstalled, now it's back.   Deal of the day is gone? Maybe my app is bugged?

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Stefan,

Sorry about that! We have addressed this issue with our latest app update. 

Please do check it out and if you have any further questions/comments then please feel free to reach out to us at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Saud adnan
comment: Great company,, happy to buy from them,, my item was send quickly,, and most importantly i found the galaxy view there even though i couldnt find it in my country or anywhere else.. contacted them once and they were caring and profissional..great choice:)

author: Danny Covell
comment: Scan credit card does not work on S7. Interface a little confusing on where to add an item to cart.

author: David Efurd
comment: Amazing user experience. Couldn't be easier to purchase items with Google Pay (probably too easy). Love this company!

author: Erin McCann
comment: App has been fixed and is back to being a wonderful way to check B&H inventory and deals.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Eric,

Sorry about that! We have addressed this issue with our latest app update. 

Please do check it out and if you have any further questions/comments then please feel free to reach out to us at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

comment: Garbage not working after last update note3

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi there,

We have made a change on our side that should have fixed the issue. If you can just restart the B&H app and let us know if the fix is working for you, that would be great! If you have any further questions then please do not hesitate to reach out to androidappsupport@bhphoto.com

author: Neil Kohl
comment: B&H sets the standard for shopping apps. Easy to use, can manage my wish lists, view order information and track shipments.
B&H! Saved me some tax $$ on a tablet I bought compared to Amazon. And Free shipping on that item. Very happy

author: Scott Deacon
comment: B & H has been my go to for photo gear for over 25 years. Fantastic site, inventory, prices and especially SERVICE.

author: Alexander Jimenez
comment: A great app to browse the BH catalog. While not the most conventional in design, it's still functional and easy to use.
Fast shipping, great prices and excellent information on every product! I have never been disappointed with B&H.

author: joseph manilla
comment: Always gives me what I need. But pls b&h try add ur delivery to Nigeria

author: Nels Norquist
comment: Works well, filters seem a little clunky, but overall a nice app from a great company

author: Kesem Torgaman
comment: This shop is soo big everything i need for video/aduio cams mics and more are there 5 stars
No matter what filters I select, it just shows all items. Website is better than the app.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi there,

We would like to address the issues that you're having. If you could please send an email to androidappsupport@bhphoto.com, we can further troubleshoot the issue and make sure that we improve upon the app experience. Thank you!

author: Mike Ehrmann
comment: Order history still not working

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hi Mike,

Sorry to hear about your order history issue and we're still looking into it. Could please send us an email to androidappsupport@bhphoto.com from the email address you use to log into the app, that will help us further evaluate the issue. Thanks and looking forward to hearing from you.

author: Toni Skokovic
comment: Great app to complement one of the best retail in person experiences out there

author: Christopher Rudkin
comment: Updated and now works great.

reply.author: B&H Photo Video
reply.content:
Hey Christopher,
Glad to hear that it's working for you now. If you have any other issues or suggestions for the app then please do let us know at androidappsupport@bhphoto.com and we will be more than happy to take a look!

Enjoy!

author: Steve Hansen
comment: Love this app and company.. I buy most of my gear from B&H
Great app, good search tools & full details on items.

author: David Dunton
comment: Makes shopping B+H easy and looks good.

author: Nikki Cruz
comment: The place where you will find any item cheaper

author: Colonious King
comment: Very easy to use, and has lots of products to choose from.
This app makes shopping at B&H simple and convenient.

author: Daniel Haywood
comment: Always a good place to buy high-quality products

author: Mayuresh Manchekar
comment: Do this app dispatched orders in India????
Bhphoto has everything at best price. Easy and best quality.

author: TecunUman Tonatiu
comment: B is for Best & H Is for High end Gadgets..
